website_summaries.verdict: A good wireless barcode scanner with the option for a USB 2.0 wired connection.
pros: Barcode scanner is strictly plug-and-play that needs no software or plugin installation to work
Scanner is comfortable in the hands for long periods of use
cons: Battery drains more quickly than advertised during normal, everyday use

customer_reviews.title: Easily one of the best purchases I've ever made
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of fighting with the $400 scanners at my job because they won't read half the bar codes that we use. So I ordered this one. I have not yet found a bar code that it won't read! It connects to the receiver immediately when you pull the trigger to turn it on. The battery life is excellent. I only have to charge it once a week. This is easily one of the best purchases I've ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Endeavor77

customer_reviews.title: This is a gift from the bar code scanning gods to us mere mortals.
customer_reviews.text: I'm coding an inventory management system and needed a simple bar code scanner to test with, so I got this NADAMOO Wireless Bar Code Scanner. It is quite possibly the best product I've ever purchased from amazon. 5 minutes with the product and you'll too see why this thing is incredible. The documentation is outstanding, every single thing you could possibly need to know about the scanner is laid out in detail, while still being a super simple read. Making the scanner work with any computer is as simple as plugging it in and scanning 3 codes. I'm going to be buying at least 4 more for my company.
customer_reviews.author: bobby

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for our tracking of guests for our meetings each ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for our tracking of guests for our meetings each night. They scan a key code upc, put it on their key chain and it worked great every night. We used it on a windows 10 laptop and on a 2017 Macbook pro with touch bar, so will do either operating system.
customer_reviews.author: Maranatha

customer_reviews.title: Great reliable scanner/excellent customer support
customer_reviews.text: This scanner works perfectly! I bought 4 of them for my office. The support team helped me set it to add prefixes before the barcode value for me to use it in a web-based software. The support service replied to my questions very quickly, within a few hours, providing clear and exact instructions. I use it in a wireless mode. The battery lasts for three weeks on average (I should note that I do not use it all the time as, for example, cashier would do).
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good, though I would have.liked the programming manual to be a bit more informative in regards to each function available. Works quite well with reading barcodes from IMEI and Serial Numbers on electronic devices; scans them right into my spreadsheet.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal H.

customer_reviews.title: Works good, love the freedom to roam wirelessly.
customer_reviews.text: Works good for most reads. I could easily get 40-50 feet away and it would still register. There were some lables it had a hard time reading. My other unit that uses a flash of light and then the laser could read them better. Overall, I loved the freedom of being untethered.
customer_reviews.author: jyee

customer_reviews.title: Would I buy this again? For the price, yes.
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well. Scans barcodes reliably and the battery life is generally very good. I did encounter some barcodes that it wouldn't identify. I'm not sure if I had to configure something in the settings, or it was a non-standard format, but I couldn't figure it out. I do wish that there were a few more settings regarding beep volume and power options. A dedicated power switch would also be nice, to prevent it from turning on in a bag. Would I buy this again? For the price, yes. But perhaps I would look for a slightly more expensive model with more features.
customer_reviews.author: peaksix

customer_reviews.title: not impressed but maybe i need to learn more  about it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hook to my laptop and scan items to list online. it beeps a very annoying beep after a few seconds after you scan something. it does not scan things easily. sometimes I have to keep going over the barcode. I am going to read up on it and see if there are some better instructions on problem solving some of these issues. it is a nice size and easy to hold if I can get it to work right.
customer_reviews.author: LISA

customer_reviews.title: Slow and not reliable
customer_reviews.text: I have several scanners and this one has to be the WORST. Crystal clear barcodes, printed on Xerox laser, take upwards to 5 seconds to scan. My old Symbol scanner scans it in under 1/2 second. Scanner constantly goes to sleep even when connected via USB cable.
customer_reviews.author: wally schwarz

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: We have been using these up to about 100' without any issues. Never tried to go any further. We are using these on a production floor and they seem to last all week on a charge so far. At this price, they cost less than the batteries in our commercial grade scanners.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: This scanner simply works good.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this scanner for approx a year now, and has worked great. We just scanned in over 15k items quickly with this, which I was super happy that it worked better than a more expensive model. It has come in handy many times and well worth the small cost.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: After scanning thousands of items with this scanner I'm impressed. It works as expected and has scanned items I didn't think would. The battery will last for weeks depending on use. Wireless distance changes depending on location and obstacles with no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: ChiVet

customer_reviews.title: and then that it was good to go
customer_reviews.text: After an initial period, where I could not get the scanner to register bar codes on Excel which it was scanning, the scanner finally started working. I think it was that my computer had to process it's presence in the system before it was compatible with it. That was an automatic process, and a small window came up which said, first, that the new device was being processed, and then that it was good to go. The staff at NADAMOO were great about getting back to me and helping me troubleshoot the initial issues. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: JustVlad

customer_reviews.title: Useless Scanner
customer_reviews.text: For starters, we could not get it to scan any barcode even after following the little user's guide with all the different barcodes. After a reset it started scanning some bar code but not others. Now, it does not hold a charge. Never actually fully used this scanner. I bought it in April and now it's useless. Compared to more known scanners this one is a failure. It is cheap and that's exactly what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Yousef Haddad

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. The scanner works well, has great battery life, and a fast response rate is instant. I did not like the long beep when the scanner went to sleep mode, but the company helped me get rid of that with a code to scan. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Schuetze

customer_reviews.title: A lot of bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a corded scanner and it has so far out performed the latter in every way. My staff has asked if we could buy another one. It reads bar codes quickly and efficiently. The only drawback is how loud the beep is when it goes to sleep, but that's a minor inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Top City Tech LLC

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Customer service were very willing to help get me set up.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this scanner for a few months now and it has worked great. I had a little trouble getting set up, but I'm not very good with things at first! I called customer service and they told me the exact step I had missed and got me set up right away.
customer_reviews.author: A. F.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described and worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to add barcode capabilities to my new business and to streamline inventory. Right out of the box this sucker worked. Instructions are easy to understand and within 5 minutes I was up and running at full speed with my software program. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: 2ndChance

customer_reviews.title: It work.
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is good and sleep mode is helpful. Makes FBA process easier to scan in and out. It feels a little cheap and always presses enter after (good/bad) 4 stars because it didn't blow me away. Just does what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Devon W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Worked well and was able to read old barcodes that other scanners were unable to read. The only issue I had was the cable stopped working. The customer service was fantastic and they sent me a new cable right away.
customer_reviews.author: Librarian Mom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing scanner
customer_reviews.text: As a teacher, I need something inexpensive that students can operate. This fit the bill. Setup to the computer was easy, students love to use it to check in and out books, and if needed, customer service is on top of things to answer questions and/or give support. I would highly recommend this product especially if you have a large library.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Love this scanner!
customer_reviews.text: As a librarian, I bought this scanner as a backup to do inventory. It quickly became my preferred scanner to check out books. It has a great wireless reach, didn't take up a lot of space, and is easy to set up with a lot of different options. Great product that I highly recommend! Not only is the scanner itself amazing, the customer service is great, too. They are quick to reply and offer very helpful suggestions.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product and amazing support!
customer_reviews.text: The two modes, online and offline, are a great value. I have an issue where the barcode read was Code128 and the hyphens were converted to tilde due that I use it in a Spanish configuration. Sent an email to support, they keep tracking the issue until getting resolved. Recommend without a doubt!
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent barcode reader
customer_reviews.text: I’m using them to read barcodes at an auction. Being wireless is a huge convenience! Battery life is very good. When it runs low i just put a new receiver into the USB port and start using it barcode reader. I numbered each pair of receiver and reader.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Shrimpton

customer_reviews.title: ... on here for the same price with a slightly better build quality
customer_reviews.text: No complaints but I bought another one on here for the same price with a slightly better build quality. I hear a light tapping from the rotating mirror inside when I scan at anything that's not an upright angle. Probably a bad sign. Still working but it's only been a couple of months. I'll update if it fails on me.
customer_reviews.author: Ilia

customer_reviews.title: Annoying Beeps.
customer_reviews.text: Disliked the product due to having to constantly having to press on the trigger to turn on only after 15 to 20 seconds of inactivity. After clicking the trigger the scanner makes an annoying beeping sound. After pressing the trigger multiple times in less than a minute the beeps get very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: VFW0305

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We bought 3 of these and have no issues. We were a little hesitant because of the low price compared to others but thought we would give them a try. We use them every day in our retail store and even dropped one and they still work great.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Durgan

customer_reviews.title: Great scanners, set up requires Excel
customer_reviews.text: I set 2 of these up at my work. The computer that has excel, all the settings work. The computer without excel still works but most of the settings wont work the same as the other scanner.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it it will scan whatever you want it to scan.
customer_reviews.text: We use these in our warehouse and haven’t found a barcode that they won’t scan.
customer_reviews.author: James Cote

customer_reviews.title: Scanner
customer_reviews.text: Once you get it set up its good. Now if I can figure out how to make it not beep so loudly when it powers down ill be happy
customer_reviews.author: selena

customer_reviews.title: Good wand
customer_reviews.text: Always ready to go. Never failed. Long range, through wall. We are happy. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chihuahuee

customer_reviews.title: easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I really haven't found anything to dislike about this item.It does what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Larson

customer_reviews.title: Mass PC Deployment , Great to have
customer_reviews.text: Quickly records serial numbers/Asset tags. That have Barcodes. Most do 500 pcs to reimaging with Windows 10 for a US Government client. Beats recording by hand then typing in MS Excel.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Love the scanner
customer_reviews.text: Love the scanner, Although I am not the techy type, This scanner is simple and easy to set up. I had questions & my emails were answered quickly. The staff is very professional. I would recommend to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: JayJill Cosmetics

customer_reviews.title: It’s 2019 , stop hand typing UPCs sis!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect with my hp envy laptop ! Great investment for my business . Stop wasting time hand typing UPCs and spending even more time verifying that you typed them in correctly and just purchase this ! I love how I can use this wireless and wired !
customer_reviews.author: ARE

customer_reviews.title: Great price point and quality
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it should. Great price point and quality. The scanner also has great battery life. I contacted support about removing the auto-enter after scanning, they were very quick to respond with the correct solution. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great pro scanner
customer_reviews.text: Great little scanner and So easy to use! I couldn’t get it to read 1 digit numbers so I contacted their customer service and they sent me a barcode to scan and everything works great. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Yerger

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Here the job done. Easy to install.I like that it scans and his enter
customer_reviews.author: My2cents

customer_reviews.title: the scanner is great work as advertised the wireless range is very good ...
customer_reviews.text: the scanner is great work as advertised the wireless range is very good read a lot different types of barcodes battery last about 3 hours of continues use I mean reading more that 3000 barcodes
customer_reviews.author: Pemig J Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: It scans barcodes. Why are you reading reviews on barcode scanners?
customer_reviews.text: It Scans. What do you want from me? A poem about how many stars this scanner should get. It’s a 5/5 scanner then. Do you even barcode?
customer_reviews.author: Glen B.

customer_reviews.title: At first they both worked fine. 6 months later - they both don'w work
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 units. At first they both worked fine. 6 months later - they both don'w work.
customer_reviews.author: RLR

customer_reviews.title: Great tool easy use
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool and super easy to use saves tons of time and shipper was fast and easy to deal with
customer_reviews.author: Maryann

customer_reviews.title: Wireless scanner love it!
customer_reviews.text: Had a meltdown on my old computer New one didn’t I couldn’t hook the old scanner up. This one worked quickly and it is wireless to boot!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Druckenmiller

customer_reviews.title: So far it has performed with accuracy.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that I can do it hands free and also not having a wire tethered.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Nishimoto

customer_reviews.title: It's a perfect scanner for the work that I do I would ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a perfect scanner for the work that I do I would recommend this to anyone who needs a good scanner for the price
customer_reviews.author: paul l stratton

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating!
customer_reviews.text: There's no way to use it to record book titles
customer_reviews.author: HipDeepInBooks

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This scanner out performs two other more expensive scanners. Most consistent/reliable scanner of the three we use.
customer_reviews.author: Tim G.

customer_reviews.title: This bar code scanner comes with an easy to use quick start guide
customer_reviews.text: This bar code scanner comes with an easy to use quick start guide. It has step by step directions for setting up the barcode scanner and using it is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer Seaver

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Bought this scanner a year ago and had problem to reprogram it, because lost a manual. Emailed them, timely responded with a solution, which got it fixed right away. Thank you for a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Arkady

customer_reviews.title: I am really impressed by how quick and easy this was to setup
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed by how quick and easy this was to setup. Very powerful scanner, great range, offers a wide array of customization options, but has worked well for me straight out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Cory H.

customer_reviews.title: great value. No proprietary software or app
customer_reviews.text: does what it says! great value. No proprietary software or app, scan saves to a document
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working after one week. It had a hard time scanning. If if did, it scanned symbols, not numbers.
customer_reviews.author: Mkimny

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: After only a few months, the scanner stopped being able to charge or hold power. I can’t get it to work at all anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Dasa York

customer_reviews.title: Scans wonderfully!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have the scanner for 6 months now and works wonderfully. It’s even scans from long distance when you don’t want to take your computer with you. Totally recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Raul

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: keep the charger close by; keep the auto off function set to the shortest time to prolong battery life.
customer_reviews.author: PATRICK Asiatico

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: happy with scanner written directions would have been nice, delivered fast not one year later needing to buy a new one
customer_reviews.author: Happy Wife

customer_reviews.title: Nice and simple to use product
customer_reviews.text: works fine. The support team was able to help set it up.
customer_reviews.author: Shahroz

customer_reviews.title: Scanner Perfection!!
customer_reviews.text: Scanner has so many functions. Works like a dream. So glad I chose this specific model for our warehouse. Works perfectly with our UPS manifest system and our operating system. Perfect!! Nadamoo customer service had all the answers I needed for smooth operation.
customer_reviews.author: Eddy Bear

customer_reviews.title: Great but beeps
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful scanner, works better than the more. Expensive ones Two complains, charger wire isn’t microUSB n scanner beeps loudly after each use.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Wong

customer_reviews.title: USB is not responding, the things doesn’t work at all
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality! The usb is not responding when the first time I used. Tried several time, not working at all. I actually need a barcode scanner in hurry, but I had to return it and to get another one. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chanell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up, easy to use, no brainer with that price!

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Amazing Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: Quick to ship .. easy to understand.. and great technical support through email
customer_reviews.author: Bela yashoda loiwal

customer_reviews.title: works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: excellent product at a very good price - does exactly what I wanted it for!

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and setup
customer_reviews.text: Well, I have purchased a 2nd one, so happy with the product.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The auto off feature doesn't work well... but the tool works perfectly aside from that
customer_reviews.author: ZRags

customer_reviews.title: It just work on van
customer_reviews.text: Good for work on Van. Make sure used a laser printer.

customer_reviews.title: Convenience!!!
customer_reviews.text: Much simpler to use than I imagined. Check in and check out made much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Jerlean P. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: It doesnt read all barcodes specially the one with white background.
customer_reviews.text: It doesnt read all barcodes specially the one with white background.
customer_reviews.author: A.Riz

customer_reviews.title: Make sure it can scan the codes you need
customer_reviews.text: Would not scan the barcodes as needed. Attempted to program it for those codes but Customer service was not helpful at all. I returned the product.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Works right out of the box.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the long range this scanner has. Great when you are checking inventory.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Take multiple tries sometimes to read a barcode and won't read some at all.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: After 3 hours of trying to get it to work I finally gave up and mailed them back

customer_reviews.title: Scans well but he battery dies very quickly. Sometimes ...
customer_reviews.text: Scans well but he battery dies very quickly. Sometimes it won't even make it through an 8 hr shift.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: it makes work simple. very easy to install and use. it's a great product.

product_meta.title: NADAMOO Wireless Barcode Scanner 2-in-1 2.4G Wireless & Wired USB Bar Code Scanner Handheld Cordless Laser Bar Code Reader Automatic Hand Scanner for Computer POS Warehouse Inventory Library
product_meta.description:
This is a 2-IN-1 plug & play barcode scanner that can read 1D linear bar codes. 

2 Connection
Wired Mode:Connect the scanner to your computer Via USB cable and upload the data into whatever software you have open to accept info
Wireless Mode:Simply plug the USB receiver into the USB port of your computer,when you scan a barcode, the value is entered into the location of the cursor. Without the entrapment of cords, wireless barcode scanner allows you to move your scanner to the inventory instead of hauling the inventory to your scanner when it comes time to count that year-end inventory.

2 Upload Mode:
Instant Upload Mode + Storage Mode
Not only does it allow your employees to instantly upload the barcode to your computer. 
But they also allow for storing the barcode inside the built-in storege of the scanner and then upload the data to your device when you need it.Internal offline storage supports up to 30000 barcodes.



Decode capacity:
UPC/EAN(include complement code), Code128
UCC/EAN128, Code39, Code 39Full ASCII, Code128Full 
ASCII, Codabar, Interleaved 2 of 5, Code93, MSI, Code11, 
ISBN, ISSN, china post code, etc 
Support to read UPS,USPS, FedEx,DHL, BOOK barcode.

Compatible Computer System
Windows, Mac and Linux

Trigger Mode:
Manual trigger,Automatic scanning 

Data editing
Support Insert,delete prefix and suffix,support for adding terminator TAB,CR,etc

Parameter
The battery is containted in the scanner. working time :7 to 10 days
Laser Class II
Maximum radiant power less than 1mW

Package list 
USB Receiver *1
Scanner*1
Charging cable*1
Manual *1

NOTE:
can not scan barcode from screen or phone
can not read 2D/QR barcode

For more details on operation, please refer to PDF manual under the Technical Specification
feature_bullets: USB plug and play, no driver needed. Easily connected with your laptop, PC, POS. Work with Windows XP/7/8/10, Mac OS, Linux.
2-in-1 Connection design: The handheld barcode scanner provides 2.4G wireless connectivity for added mobility and can be wire connected via the included USB cable.

2.4G wireless radio frequency offer the freedom to roam while staying connected to scanner. The indoor transmission distance with obstacles is about 30m / 100ft. The outdoor tansmission without obstacles can reach up to 100m / 328ft.
Two scanning mode:Key the trigger to begin scanning or switch to automatic mode for quick scanning without pressing any buttons.

Two upload mode :Instant upload mode / Collection mode. Internal offline storage supports up to 30,000 barcodes in offline storage mode. Scan and store barcode when far away from the receiver,and then update the data to your device when you come back entering the wireless transmission range.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars174 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
